metadata.title: L-Glutamine Stimulates Jejunal Sodium and Chloride Absorption in Pig Rotavirus Enteritis

abstract.original_text: Abbreviations used in this paper: G, conductance; Isc, shortcircuit current; Jm, mucosal-to-serosal flux; Jm, serosal-tomucosal flux; J.~t, net flux of Na+; j Ro. net residual flux; ORS, oral rehydration solution; ORT, oral rehydration therapy; TGE, transmissible gastroenteritis.
